sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-row>
        <b-col sm="4">
            <first-name-field
                    :id="`childFirstNameFieldset${index}`"
                    :value="$store.state.orderForm.children[this.index].firstName"
                    :setter="setChildFirstName"
            />
        </b-col>
        <b-col sm="4">
            <last-name-field
                    :id="`childFirstNameFieldset${index}`"
                    :value="$store.state.orderForm.children[this.index].lastName"
                    :setter="setChildLastName"
            />
        </b-col>
        <b-col sm="4">
            <b-form-group
                    :id="`childDateOfBirthFieldset${index}`"
                    label="Dátum narodenia"
                    :label-for="`childDateOfBirth${index}`"
                    :invalid-feedback="dateOfBirthInvalidFeedback"
                    :valid-feedback="dateOfBirthValidFeedback"
                    :state="dateOfBirthState"
            >
                <b-form-input :id="`childDateOfBirth${index}`" type="date" v-model="dateOfBirth" trim/>
            </b-form-group>
        </b-col>
    </b-row>
</template>

<script>
  import FirstNameField from './FormFields/FirstNameField';
  import LastNameField from './FormFields/LastNameField';

  export default {
    name: 'child-form',
    components: {FirstNameField, LastNameField},
    props: {
      index: String,
      default: function () {
        return "0"
      }
    },
    computed: {
      dateOfBirth: {
        get() {
          return this.$store.state.orderForm.children[this.index].dateOfBirth;
        },
        set(value) {
          let kidStructure = {...this.$store.state.orderForm.children[this.index]};
          kidStructure.dateOfBirth = value;
          this.$store.commit('orderForm/updateChildren', {id: this.index, kidStructure})
        }
      },
      dateOfBirthInvalidFeedback() {
        if (this.$store.state.orderForm.children[this.index].dateOfBirth.length > 0) {
          return ''
        } else {
          return 'Povinné pole'
        }
      },
      dateOfBirthValidFeedback() {
        return this.dateOfBirthNumberState === true ? '✓' : ''
      },
      dateOfBirthState() {
        return this.$store.state.orderForm.children[this.index].dateOfBirth.length >= 7
      },
    },
    methods: {
      setChildFirstName(value) {
        let kidStructure = {...this.$store.state.orderForm.children[this.index]};
        kidStructure.firstName = value;
        this.$store.commit('orderForm/updateChildren', {id: this.index, kidStructure})
      },
      setChildLastName(value) {
        let kidStructure = {...this.$store.state.orderForm.children[this.index]};
        kidStructure.lastName = value;
        this.$store.commit('orderForm/updateChildren', {id: this.index, kidStructure})
      },
    }

  }
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>
</style>
